channel.title: Project on Alejandro U. Alvarez
channel.description: Recent content in Project on Alejandro U. Alvarez

item.title: Launching dotdot.im - New Side Project!
item.description: About a month ago I had the idea to make a chat where you’d be put in a “room” with a group of people, not too big, so you can just have a chat. No complications, just that. Then the isolation came, bringing with it a ton of free time and an even better reason to make this - people would be bored at home! So we set out to make it, I managed to convince a couple of friends to give me a hand with this: @prhcummins and @jaicab and off we went.
